TopicTitle: [QoL] Holding Shift key to quickly perform actions without pop-ups.

Articles.Content:
When deleting my autosaves or debris, I find it quite annoying that I can't do it fast. A pop-up always appear, which is a good thing, but when you are CERTAIN you want to destroy hundreds of debris, it gets annoying-

So, shift will act as a "Click at your own risk" type of thing. Disabling warning pop-ups when held. So you could destroy debris and pesky autosaves just by spamming!
If you destroy an important thing when doing that though, well, your problem now. Shift key isn't liable for the damage there.

This definitely could have more applications and potential than just destroying, of course. But I can't go farther than that-

I may also add to the topic of quick deleting of debris, that a button to remove all debris would be quite useful.
I can imagine an icon of a broom in the tracking station debris category just signifying "cleanup", destroying all debris.

Or maybe keep the confirmation box (because you can still missclick with your implementation) but add the possibility to select multiple craft like windows do (and many other).

Ctrl for selecting specific files:

Alt for selecting a set of files:

And after that, you hit delete and it asks you if you want to delete X craft and say yes.
